description: Award-winning trekking trousers in stretch fabric and G-1000 Eco. Just as before, the trousers have classic, large pockets, generous ventilation zippers now with mesh backing and openings for knee pads (an accessory). Leg endings are easy to adjust and repair. A well-fitting, durable classic for maximum freedom of movement in the mountains.
name: Keb Trousers, Long - Womens

specs.value: Now with a more inclusive fit for improved freedom of movement and comfort
